meanings.definition: A Mesoamerican civilization known for its advanced knowledge of mathematics and astronomy.
meanings.sent1: The Mayas were skilled in math and astronomy.
meanings.sent2: Many ancient ruins belong to the Mayas.
meanings.sent3: The Mayas must have been the smartest people back then!
meanings.sent4: Their understanding of the stars was as deep as the Mayas' temples.
meanings.sent5: The Mayas' math skills were as impressive as their towering pyramids.

meanings.definition: A group of indigenous peoples in southern Mexico and Central America.
meanings.sent1: The Mayas lived in the lush jungles of Central America.
meanings.sent2: Many traditions of the Mayas are still practiced today.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could meet the Mayas and learn from them!
meanings.sent4: The Mayas' culture is as rich as the colors of a tropical bird.
meanings.sent5: The Mayas' history is as fascinating as a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.

meanings.sent1: Exercising regularly can help strengthen your mayas.
meanings.sent2: It's important to engage your mayas during core workouts.
meanings.sent3: I can feel my mayas working hard after that exercise!
meanings.sent4: The mayas are like a natural girdle supporting your body.
meanings.sent5: Remember to stretch your mayas to avoid muscle strain.
